description: Numbers n such that n concatenated with n+1 is a square.
comments: Also called Sastry numbers. - _Lekraj Beedassy_, Jul 18 2008
references: J.-M. De Koninck, Ces nombres qui nous fascinent, Entry 183, p. 56, Ellipses, Paris 2008.
links: Giovanni Resta, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..198 (terms < 10^20)
author: _Patrick De Geest_
